description: Dashboard for Spring Boot2 statistics(by micrometer-prometheus).

targets.expr: sum by (instance) (jvm_memory_used_bytes{ instance=~"$instance", job=~"$job", area="heap"})*100/sum by (instance) (jvm_memory_max_bytes{instance=~"$instance", job=~"$job", area="heap"})
sum by (instance)(jvm_memory_used_bytes{ instance=~"$instance", job=~"$job", area="nonheap"})*100/sum by (instance) (jvm_memory_max_bytes{instance=~"$instance", job=~"$job", area="nonheap"})

irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", job=~"$job",  exception="none", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[$__rate_interval]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", job=~"$job",  exception="none", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[$__rate_interval])

title: Spring Boot statistics
